name: Hexarelin
overview: A synthetic hexapeptide and potent growth hormone secretagogue. Research has also explored its potential cardioprotective effects beyond growth hormone stimulation.
interactions_notes: May interact with medications affecting growth hormone, cortisol, or prolactin. Can cause desensitization with continuous use. Comprehensive endocrine evaluation recommended before use.
dosing_ranges_literature: Research protocols have used doses ranging from 100-200 mcg administered 1-2 times daily. Cycling protocols often recommended due to desensitization concerns.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution with bacteriostatic water, store refrigerated and use within 2-3 weeks.
